name.title: Name
name.description: Your desired display name for in the homebridge logs.

name.title: Name
name.description: Your desired display name for in HomeKit.

ip.title: ip
ip.description: IP for your Slide on your router. Should be a fixed IP address.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code with 8 characters from the sticker on the top of your Slide or in the manual.

tolerance.title: Tolerance
tolerance.description: Threshold in % to still consider state fully open or fully closed. Defaults to 5.

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval
pollInterval.description: Time in seconds to poll the Slide curtain. Defaults to 20 seconds.
